channel.title: Adventurecraft Map WIP
channel.description:
Its a concept of a Zelda dungeon I made some time ago. I only have the first floor done so far though. It takes about 5 minutes to get to the second floor, took me roughly 3-5 hours to create what I have so far. I'll post a download link once I finish the map.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_GJnjEoKUUY
Enjoy.
UPDATE JUNE 26 2011:
The map is done (i think)! There is more stuff than there was in the video (much more), a boss, a joke of a mini boss (lol), and plenty more! All you have to do is go to your AdventureCraft folder, then go to the .minecraft folder from there. Move the folder named Forsaken Hollow from the .zip file to the saves folder and you'll be good to go! Remember, you must have to Biome Test map for this to work since I couldn't make it work as an actual map :|
Enjoy guys!

item.title: Adventurecraft Map WIP
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

HOLY CRAP. IT. IS. DONE. Its not a map because I’m stupid and couldn’t figure out how to make it a map <.< BUT… it works as a save for the Biome Test map that comes with AdventureCraft. I’ll attach the file to the main post for anybody who wishes to play it
